meanings.definition: A fictional family of monsters from a television show.
meanings.sent1: The Munsters lived in a spooky house.
meanings.sent2: I watched an episode of The Munsters yesterday.
meanings.sent3: The Munsters threw a Halloween party in their haunted mansion.
meanings.sent4: The Munsters were as strange as creatures from another world.
meanings.sent5: The Munsters' eerie appearance made them unforgettable.

meanings.definition: A person who is a member of the Munster Rugby team.
meanings.sent1: My friend is a talented Munsters player.
meanings.sent2: The Munsters won the championship last year.
meanings.sent3: The Munsters practiced hard to improve their rugby skills.
meanings.sent4: Being a Munsters player requires dedication and teamwork.
meanings.sent5: The Munsters' teamwork on the field was impressive.

meanings.sent1: The Munsters family has a long history.
meanings.sent2: I met a person with the last name Munsters.
meanings.sent3: The Munsters surname is unique and memorable.
meanings.sent4: Carrying the Munsters name comes with a sense of pride.
meanings.sent5: The Munsters surname echoes through generations.
